      void assignShift(java.lang.String documentNumber, java.lang.String documentType, java.lang.String type)
      this method allow assign a instance of Shift to a user through their identity document number (the turn is formed by a letter of the alphabet and a number from 0 to 99, which go from lowest to highest always and once it goes from 99 it returns to 00 and the letter increases) taking into account if the user does not have any turn over the current shift.

      • getUserShift

        public java.util.ArrayList<User> getUserShift()

      • searchUser

        public java.lang.String searchUser(java.lang.String documentNumber,
                                   java.lang.String documentType)
                            throws UserNoExistException
        This method allows you to search for a user's information to return it in a string of characters, the method searches for the user in the list of users and in case it is not found, throw an exception
        Parameters:
        documentNumber - this parameter is a String that represents the number of the user's document to look for
        documentType - this parameter us a String that represents the type of document that have the user to look for, this parameter only can have the following options: citizenship card, civil registration,passport,foreign identity card
        Returns:
        this method return a String that represent the information of the User to look for, the information has been save in a method toString() that exist in the User class.
        Throws:
        UserNoExistException - This exception will be thrown when the user to search does not succeed

      • assignShift

        public void assignShift(java.lang.String documentNumber,
                        java.lang.String documentType,
                        java.lang.String type)
                 throws UserAlreadyHasShiftException,
                        ShiftTypeNotExist,
                        UserHasBeenBannedException
        this method allow assign a instance of Shift to a user through their identity document number (the turn is formed by a letter of the alphabet and a number from 0 to 99, which go from lowest to highest always and once it goes from 99 it returns to 00 and the letter increases) taking into account if the user does not have any turn over the current shift.
        Parameters:
        documentNumber - this parameter is a String that represents the number of the user's document to assign shift
        documentType - this parameter us a String that represents the type of document that have the user to assign shift, this parameter only can have the following options: citizenship card, civil registration,passport,foreign identity card
        Throws:
        UserAlreadyHasShiftException - this exception will be thrown when the user to assign a shift already have a shift assigned over the current shift
        ShiftTypeNotExist - this exception will be thrown when the parameter type, don't exist
        UserHasBeenBanned - This exception will be thrown when try to assign a shift to an user that is banned
        UserHasBeenBannedException

      • generateNextShift

        public Shift generateNextShift(Type type)
        This method allows to generate the next turn corresponding to the list of assigned shifts (UserShift), the method will take the last assigned turn and increase it by one, to return the result, also add the type of shift to the user
        Parameters:
        type, - this parameter is a refer of the Type class that will be the type of shift to add, this parameter is not null
        Returns:
        this method returns an instance of the Shift class, this represent to the next of the list

      • registerUser

        public void registerUser(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String lastName,
                         java.lang.String documentType,
                         java.lang.String documentNumber,
                         java.lang.String locate,
                         java.lang.String numberPhone)
                  throws IdUserExistException,
                         ValueIsEmptyException
        This method allow to create a new User and to add in the list of Users, only can be add if the id and type of the user does'nt exist otherwise it will throw an exception
        Parameters:
        name - this parameter is a String that represent the name of the User
        lastName - this parameter is a String that represent the last name of the User
        documentType - this parameter is a String that represent the document of the User, this parameter only can be: citizenship card, civil registration,passport,foreign identity card
        documentNumber - this parameter is a String that represent the document Number of the User
        locate - this parameter is a String that represent the locate of the User, this parameter does'nt obligatory so if this parameter is empty will be "unknown"
        numberPhone - this parameter is a String that represent the number phone of the User, this parameter does'nt obligatory so if this parameter is empty will be "unknown"
        Throws:
        IdUserExistException - this exception will be throw if already exist a user whit the same id and type id in the users list
        ValueIsEmptyException - this exception will be throw if any of the following parameters is empty: name, lastName, documentType and documentNumber.

      • advanceShift

        public void advanceShift()
                  throws NoMoreShiftException
        this method actualize the current shift and put random value to all users with shift that have a turn before of the time now if was attended or not
        Throws:
        NoMoreShiftException - this exception will be thrown when no exist more users with shift in the list

      • advanceAll

        public void advanceAll()
        this method advance all shift in the list no matter what time and put random value to all users with shift if was attended or not

      • showSystemTime

        public void showSystemTime()
        This method shoe in console the time that corresponding to the time of system with the time that the user can actualize

      • changeTime

        public void changeTime(int year,
                       int month,
                       int day,
                       int hour,
                       int minute,
                       int second)
                throws TimeDateNoValid
        This method is to change the time of the system to a new time but higher than now, this method save the difference of these times
        Parameters:
        year - this parameter is a value that represent the new year that the user want to change
        month - this parameter is a value that represent the new month that the user want to change
        day - this parameter is a value that represent the new day that the user want to change
        hour - this parameter is a value that represent the new hour that the user want to change
        minute - this parameter is a value that represent the new minute that the user want to change
        second - this parameter is a value that represent the new second that the user want to change
        Throws:
        TimeDateNoValid - this exception will be thrown when the user type values lower that the time now

      • changeTime

        public void changeTime()
        this method return the value of the time to the time of the compete system

      • addTypeShift

        public void addTypeShift(java.lang.String name,
                         double duration)
                  throws NameShiftTypeAlreadyExist
        this method add a type of shift to the list of types of shift
        Parameters:
        name - this parameter represent the name of the type of shift
        duration - this parameter represent the duration that have the shift
        Throws:
        NameShiftTypeAlreadyExist - this exception will be thrown when the name of the type already exist

      • generateReportUserShift

        public void generateReportUserShift(java.lang.String documentType,
                                    java.lang.String documentNumber,
                                    int option,
                                    int order)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    UserNoExistException
        this method allow create or show in console a report of the all shift that an user has had in the system.
        Parameters:
        documentType - this parameter represent the type of document that the user have
        documentNumber - this parameter represent the number of document that the user have
        option - this parameter is a integer that represent if the user want generate a file, show in console or both
        order - this parameter is a integer that represent how the user want order the report
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - this exception is thrown when the file or folder are damage
        UserNoExistException - this exception will be thrown when the user is not exist

      • generateReportShiftUsers

                                     int option,
                                     int order)
                              throws java.io.IOException

        Parameters:

        option - this parameter is a integer that represent if the user want generate a file, show in console or both
        order - this parameter is a integer that represent how the user want order the report
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException this exception is thrown when the file or folder are damage
